1057947317012172801.text:
My daughter, a 3rd year medical student doing inpatient rotation at a well-established AMC w/ top-tier EHR, says they get medical records on incoming patients in two ways: 
1) stack of paper from patient
2) old-timey fax machine 
She had to be taught how to use manual fax.
